name: Missed Connections (Niandra!)
description:
Missed Connections is a a short ~5 minute Visual Novel made in five days for the Black And White Jam #8. It tells the story of Bea, a late twenties something who is meeting a high school friend they haven't talked to in a decade.

This is a Visual Novel about feeling behind your peers and the opportunities you get when you stop holding onto the past,

It's also the first short story I've written myself! Feedback and constructive criticism is absolutely welcome. Although there's some stuff I wish I had done differently, and expanded upon, I am quite happy with how this project came out.

Credits:

- Programming by Niandra!

- Writing by Niandra!

- Sound effects from FreeSound.org

- Shipwreck Cover by Purrple Cat

Trigger Warning for mild references/mentions of transphobia.
